text: Ia uari uan osɨmtɨziba bagh mɨzazim iniam, kamaghɨn derazir puvatɨ. Ian tongɨn tav gumazitam mɨsueghtɨma an aremegham, o a biziba okɨmam, o a tintinimɨn arazir kurabar amuam, o a tintinimɨn gumazir igharazibar bizibar ganam, me an arazir kaba baghɨva osɨmtɨzim a darɨghtɨma, kamaghɨn derazir puvatɨ.
